events.name: Lithium-Ion Battery Supply Chain Management
events.wd_description: The most critical phases of the life cycle of lithium-ion batteries are managed in a few countries.

events.name: DRC Cobalt and Lithium Supply
events.wd_description: The DRC is the main provider of cobalt and lithium.

events.name: China Synthetic and Natural Graphite, Refined Cobalt, and Lithium-Ion Cells and Batteries
events.wd_label: China Synthetic and Natural Graphite, Refined Cobalt, and Lithium-Ion Cells and Batteries
events.wd_description: China is the main provider of synthetic and natural graphite, refined cobalt, as well as lithium-ion cells and batteries.
events.description: China is the main provider of synthetic and natural graphite, refined cobalt, as well as lithium-ion cells and batteries.

events.name: South Korea Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: South Korea is leading in battery recycling, but some OEMs are putting in place their own recycling.

events.name: European Commission Designation of Critical Raw Materials
events.wd_label: European Commission Designation of Critical Raw Materials
events.wd_description: The European Commission designated cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel as critical raw materials for battery production, urging for a sustainable supply chain, improved cell performance and durability, and recycling technology innovation.
events.description: The European Commission designated cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel as critical raw materials for battery production, urging for a sustainable supply chain, improved cell performance and durability, and recycling technology innovation.

events.name: European Commission Designation
events.description: The European Commission has designated cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel as critical raw materials for battery production.
